text: 🔥 This one’s a must-save!! 😋 (Especially if you’re haunted by sweet cravings every dang day but really don’t wanna slip into old snacking habits) And the good news? This yummy blackberry cake has ZERO added sugars which is great ‘cause we don’t wanna trigger dumping syndrome right? Here’s the full recipe (we used a 1-cup container) 👇 1 egg 1/2 cup cottage cheese 1/2 cup Greek yogurt 1 tsp vanilla extract 1 tsp lemon zest 1/2 tsp baking powder 3 tbsp protein powder 1/4 cup blackberries Garnish 👇 Grated dark chocolate Lemon zest
fullText: 🔥 This one’s a must-save!! 😋 (Especially if you’re haunted by sweet cravings every dang day but really don’t wanna slip into old snacking habits) And the good news? This yummy blackberry cake has ZERO added sugars which is great ‘cause we don’t wanna trigger dumping syndrome right? Here’s the full recipe (we used a 1-cup container) 👇 1 egg 1/2 cup cottage cheese 1/2 cup Greek yogurt 1 tsp vanilla extract 1 tsp lemon zest 1/2 tsp baking powder 3 tbsp protein powder 1/4 cup blackberries Garnish 👇 Grated dark chocolate Lemon zest Sweetener Directions 👇 1. Preheat oven to 375F (180C). 2. Add all ingredients, except the blackberries, to a bowl and whisk. 3. Add the blackberries on top. 3. Pour in oven safe dish with parchment paper and bake, about 30 minutes. 4. Allow to cool off and place in fridge for a couple of hours. 5. Garnish with (SF) chocolate and lemon zest Enjoy!! 😘😘 and follow @your.onederland for more simple meals to keep your stomach happy! 🙋‍♀️ Do you wanna see more “sweet” recipes like this one? Let us know below!! ⬇️ • • • #bariatricrecipes #wlsrecipes #blackberrycake #vsgfood #wlsfoodie #vsgeats #wlseats #wlsdiet #gastricsleeverecipes #sleevesurgery #bariatriceats
